title: #100DaysofKashmirSiege: बिहार का वीडियो कश्मीरी मुस्लिम बच्चे को मारने के दावे से शेयर
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: A Kashmiri Muslim child has just been tortured to death by RSS Hindutva Nazi goons. My question to western leaders: would you allow this to happen to your children & silently spectate? Can any sane mind justify this? #100DaysOfKashmirSiegepic.twitter.com/dsS3kuCY5C
